forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 19C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
